EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-03-Field-West-RD-Sponsored-Portland.Marketing Invitation 1.EMAIL - M
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Portland Trailblazers vs Houston Rockets
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-portland/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform their IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reimagine their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go in the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – and mistakes are costly. This is exacerbated even further once customers get to the cloud and need to manage its complexity. We're getting ready to host an exciting event of to discuss these challenges and enjoy, food, drinks, and of course basketball as the Los Angeles Kings take on the Montreal Canadiens.
Portland Executive Networking event Portland Trailblazers vs Houston Rockets Tuesday, March 20th | Moda Center | 7:00 p.m.
Save the date for March 6th at 5:30 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/vip-portland <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-portland/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
